name: Suplex
summary: Flexing your entire body, you heave your opponent over your head and slam them into the ground.
description:
Flexing your entire body, you heave your opponent over your head and slam them into the ground. Make an unarmed melee Strike against the creature you have grabbed or restrained; on a success, the target lands prone, and on a critical success, the target lands prone and takes an additional 2d6 bludgeoning damage. Regardless of whether the Strike is successful, you immediately release your hold on the target.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
